meta.description: Learn how to Automate Data Center resources with UCS Director APIs. UCS Director's native REST API, custom tasks with integrated JavaScript, Open Automation SDK and PowerShell integration enable complete automation capabilities for the Data Center. Use the UCS Director REST APIs to automate everything from the provisioning of a server to the quick deployment of development environments and more.
